sent.orig: The understanding of electromagnetic radiation underwent particle theory, wave theory, wave-particle theory.
sent.trans: 电磁辐射的认识经历了微粒说、波动说、波粒二象性的过程。

sent.orig: I divide the forensic accounting theory system into the basic theory and the application theory.
sent.trans: 本文将法务会计理论体系划分为基础理论和应用理论两个层次。

sent.orig: Research and teaching: microeconomic theory, game theory and social choice theory.
sent.trans: 主要研究和教学领域：微观经济理论、对策论、社会选择理论。

sent.orig: This paper of compensation management such as fairness theory, double factor theory and expectation theory.
sent.trans: 公平理论、双因素理论、期望理论等激励理论也要经常应用。

sent.orig: The strength theory,dendritic bridging theory,solidification shrinkage reparing theory and CSC criterion,HCS criterion are stressed.
sent.trans: 重点介绍了强度理论、晶间搭桥理论、凝固收缩补偿理论和 CSC判据、HCS判据。
